name: NWProtocolTCP
desc: A network protocol for connections that use the Transmission Control Protocol.

items.name: class NWProtocolTCP.Options
items.desc: A container of options for configuring how TCP is used on a connection.

items.name: static let definition: NWProtocolDefinition
items.desc: The system definition of the Transport Control Protocol.

items.name: class NWProtocolTCP.Metadata
items.desc: A handle you can use to inspect a connection's TCP state.
